<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Classify names, predicting entire distribution."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/classify-distribution"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Classifying names using this endpoint will return the predicted confidence for each ethnicity.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Schema to validate name classification request data ","example":{"modelName":"chinese_german_french","names":["Cixin Liu","werner heisenberg","Jules Verne"]},"properties":{"modelName":{"title":"Modelname","type":"string"},"names":{"items":{"type":"string"},"title":"Names","type":"array"}},"required":["modelName","names"],"title":"InferenceSchema","type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful classification","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"additionalProperties":{"additionalProperties":{"type":"number"},"type":"object"},"description":"Schema to validate the /classify-distribution POST response data ","example":{"Cixin Liu":{"chinese":0.91,"french":0.04,"german":0.05},"Jules Verne":{"chinese":0.2,"french":0.75,"german":0.13},"werner heisenberg":{"chinese":0.06,"french":0.07,"german":0.87}},"title":"InferenceDistributionResponseSchema","type":"object"}}}},"401":{"description":"Authentication failed"},"404":{"description":"Model not found"},"422":{"description":"Too many names"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
